entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 a.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening then changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight then increasing to 60 gusting to 80. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
